alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 11:19AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Miami, southern Johnson, Cass, northwestern Bates, southern Ray, western Lafayette, Jackson and northwestern Johnson Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1119 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sibley to near Paola. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Lenexa, Leawood, Raytown, Grandview, Belton, Prairie Village, Raymore, Gardner, Grain Valley, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Oak Grove, Paola and Spring Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 7 and 43. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 200 and 222. Interstate 470 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 435 near mile marker 0, and between mile markers 61 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for east central Kansas...and west central Missouri.
